title: Quick Transmigration Cannon Fodder’s Record of Counterattacks - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Alchemy   Aliens   Artifacts   Beast Companions   Bullying   Cultivation   Demons   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Hackers   Hard-Working Protagonist   Interdimensional Travel   Proactive Protagonist   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Scientists   Sharing A Body   Soul Power   Special Abilities   Survival Game   System Administrator   Technological Gap   Time Skip   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Virtual Reality   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: Hen Shi Jiao Qing   很是矫情
description:
Ning Shu had dropped dead. But in a burst of good fortune, she became a task-taker in charge of counterattacking for the pitiful cannon fodders. Thus, Ning Shu, in one world after another, took all kinds of life roles and encountered all kinds of “you’re heartless, you’re ruthless, you’re making trouble for no reason” people. She encountered all sorts of white lotus flowers, green tea bitches, scheming bitches, by the batch.

“Does any true beauty still exist in the world?!” Bellowed Ning Shu angrily. “You annoying trash! I’m just here to counterattack, please don’t get in the way of me completing my task.” Transmigration main character, reincarnation main character. There’s only a lazy task-taker, no indestructible main character halo. Ning Shu had no choice, but to painfully gather moral integrity in each of the worlds.>
